summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 HONDA CR-V. AFTER EXITING THE VEHICLE AFTER PARKING IT IN A GARAGE, IT CONTINUED TO RUN WHILE IDLING. AS A RESULT, CARBON MONOXIDE FILLED THE RESIDENCE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE CONTACT AND HIS SPOUSE WENT TO THE HOSPITAL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 14,000.  THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE WAS ACCIDENTALLY LEFT RUNNING., DUE TO THE VEHICLE BEING EQUIPPED WITH PUSH START.  UPDATED 11/08/16.*JB
